DryRun.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the action, without actually making the request, and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation. Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.

Filters.description: Filter tasks using the task-state filter and one of the following values: active, completed, deleting, deleted.

ImportTaskIds.description: A list of import image task IDs.

MaxResults.description: The maximum number of results to return in a single call. To retrieve the remaining results, make another call with the returned NextToken value.

NextToken.description: A token that indicates the next page of results.
